text: Zhichi baozuo de he huanrao baozuo de, dou zansong tamen de zhu, dou gui xin ta, dou wei xindao zhe qiurao, tamen shuo: Women de zhu a! Zai enhui fangmian he zhijue fangmian, ni shi baoluo wanwu de, qiu ni she you huiguo zi xin, erqie zunxun ni de zhengdao zhe. Qiu ni baohu tamen, mian shou huo yu de xingfa.
